name: Tap Goddess
description:
Fox Lord Su Daji has lost her mind and killed many loyal people, a small fox can not bear to see her sister sink degenerate that beyond redemption, determined to ask the gods to help save her sister.

1, A large wave (sexy) of monsters with funny voice are waiting for your challenges, please listen carefully! (Public places, please use headphones oh ~ ~)
2,More than 30 famous oriental gods is waiting for your call! \ (≧ ▽ ≦) / ~
3, Dozens of artifacts ™ are awakening, use your hand to recast the glory!
4, The super-lethal ancient secret, just waiting for your touch to activate!
5, A number of aesthetic level scene, see who can be the first to break through the barrier!
6, Timing random gift chest, daily challenge dungeon BOSS and gain magic weapons and a variety of treasures!
7, Free massive diamonds reward, you only need to complete the quest!
8, Immediately entered the game, together with the little fox to save the lost goddess!

Small fox: Hey, handsome, come and help me NOW! ~|.мīss.чou

Summary Raiders tips \ (^ o ^) /:
1, With a star mark of the hero skills for all hero's damage bonuses, including the player's skill damage.
2, Collect all the hero weapons will have double relic reward!
3, The more expensive the hero to increase the DPS more, so you should give priority to upgrading the advanced hero.
4, When it is difficult to customs clearance, try to first upgrade all heroes to 100 and unlock the skills, and then upgrade to 200 and unlock skills, then 400, and so on ...
5, Hero reincarnation skills need to re-unlock, please grasp the opportunity Oh!
6, If gold is not enough, you can consider use of "Make it rain!" skill ~
7, Watch video ads can have chance to get diamonds, but the number of video is limited.
8, From stage 80 you can get relics form BOSS o (∩ _ ∩) o
9, The daily challenge will be more rewarding, not only relic and diamonds, but also hero weapons you can take!
10, You can try to use "Critical Strike" skill to kill monster instantly!
11, Mobile phone power lost too fast? Goto the option and find the power button to switch to low power state, that's easy ~ ~
Can't tell you more... _ (: з ゝ∠) _
